report: Your symptoms could indicate hypothyroidism. Ask your doctor for TSH blood test before considering medication.

report: Yes, Diphenhydramine cream is safe for topical use in children for poison ivy itching relief.

report: Niacin can raise blood sugar. Requires careful monitoring and possible medication adjustment.

report: Triptans like Sumatriptan are first-line for acute migraine attacks.
